title: Skin Condition Diagnosis

instructionSteps.uploadDesc: Take a clear photo of the affected skin area and upload it to the system. You can drag and drop your image here.
instructionSteps.analysisDesc: The system will analyze the image and predict the most likely skin condition among 7 possible classes.
instructionSteps.resultsDesc: Choose one of the explainable AI methods to see which areas of the image the model focused on.

notAuthTitle: Log In for a Better Experience
notAuthDesc: You donâ€™t need to log in to continue. However, signing in lets you keep track of your requests and access more features.
analysis_failed: Image analysis failed. Please try again.

analysisStep.mostLikelyCondition: This is the most likely condition based on our analysis.
analysisStep.disclaimer: This analysis is for informational purposes only and should not replace professional medical advice.
analysisStep.no_results: No results were obtained from the image analysis. Please try again.
analysisStep.lowConfidenceMessage: We couldn't analyze your image with sufficient confidence. Please try again with a better quality image.
analysisStep.suggestion2: Make sure the focus is clear
